00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     PagingLandScapeHorizon::PagingLandScapeHorizon(const PagingLandScapeOptions *options)
00048     {
00049         mPageWidth = options->world_width;
00050         mPageHeight = options->world_height;
00051 
00052         mNumTilesPage = options->NumTiles;
00053 
00054         mTileWidth = mPageWidth * mNumTilesPage;
00055         mTileHeight = mPageHeight * mNumTilesPage;
00056 
00057         size_t p_memssize = mPageWidth*mPageHeight;
00058 
00059         mMinPageHeights = new Real[p_memssize];
00060         memset (mMinPageHeights, 0, p_memssize * sizeof(Real));
00061 
00062         mMaxPageHeights = new Real[p_memssize];
00063         memset (mMaxPageHeights, 0, p_memssize * sizeof(Real));
00064 
00065         size_t t_memssize = mTileWidth*mTileHeight;
00066 
00067         mMinTileHeights = new Real[t_memssize];
00068         memset (mMinTileHeights, 0, t_memssize * sizeof(Real));
00069 
00070         mMaxTileHeights = new Real[t_memssize];
00071         memset (mMaxTileHeights, 0, t_memssize * sizeof(Real));
00072         
00073         material_enabled = false;
00074         mVisData = 0;
00075     }    
00076     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     PagingLandScapeHorizon::~PagingLandScapeHorizon()
00078     {
00079            delete [] mMinPageHeights;
00080            delete [] mMaxPageHeights;
00081 
00082            delete [] mMinTileHeights;
00083            delete [] mMaxTileHeights;
00084 
00085        mVisibilityMaterial.setNull();
00086     }
00087    //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::prepare(const PagingLandScapeCamera* cam)
00089     {        
00090         if (material_enabled)
00091         {
00092             //reset.
00093             memset (mVisData, 0, mTileWidth * mTileHeight * 4);
00094 
00095             //add camera point        
00096             const Real tileX = cam->mCurrentCameraPageX * mNumTilesPage + cam->mCurrentCameraTileX;
00097             const Real tileZ = cam->mCurrentCameraPageZ * mNumTilesPage + cam->mCurrentCameraTileZ;
00098             const unsigned int tilePos = static_cast <unsigned int> ((tileX + tileZ * mTileWidth) * 4);
00099             mVisData [ tilePos ]    = 0;
00100             mVisData [ tilePos + 1] = 0;
00101             mVisData [ tilePos + 2] = 255;
00102             mVisData [ tilePos + 3] = 255;
00103         }
00104     }
00105    //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00106     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::update()
00107     { 
00108         if (material_enabled)
00109         {
00110             const PixelBox srcBox = mVisImage.getPixelBox();
00111 
00112             HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr Texbuffer = mVisTex->getBuffer (0, 0); 
00113             const PixelBox lock = Texbuffer->lock (srcBox, HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); 
00114             // lock.data can now be freely accessed  
00115             PixelUtil::bulkPixelConversion(srcBox, lock); 
00116 
00117             Texbuffer->unlock();  
00118         }
00119     }
00120     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     MaterialPtr PagingLandScapeHorizon::getVisibilityMaterial()
00122     {
00123         if (mVisibilityMaterial.isNull())
00124         {        
00125             const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mOptions;
00126             const String filename = opt->LandScape_filename;
00127             const String name = filename +
00128                 "Visibility";
00129             mVisibilityMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName (name);
00130             if (mVisibilityMaterial.isNull())
00131             {
00132                 mVisibilityMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().create (name, 
00133                                                                               opt->groupName);
00134 
00135                 TextureUnitState *tu0 = mVisibilityMaterial->getTechnique (0)->
00136                                         getPass (0)->createTextureUnitState ();
00137  
00138                 tu0->setTextureName (filename + ".Small." + 
00139                                      opt->TextureExtension);
00140 
00141                 
00142                 tu0->setAlphaOperation (LBX_BLEND_MANUAL, LBS_MANUAL, LBS_CURRENT, 0.7, 1, 1);
00143                 //tu0->setTextureAddressingMode (TextureUnitState::TextureAddressingMode::TAM_CLAMP);
00144                         tu0->setTextureAddressingMode (TextureUnitState::TAM_CLAMP);
00145                         mVisibilityMaterial->setSceneBlending (SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
00146                 //mVisibilityMaterial->setDepthCheckEnabled (false);
00147                 //mVisibilityMaterial->setDepthWriteEnabled (false);
00148 
00149                 const size_t s = mTileWidth * mTileHeight * 4;
00150                 uchar *TexData = new uchar [s];
00151                 memset (TexData, 0, s * sizeof(uchar));
00152                         // Assign the texture to the alpha map                  
00153                         mVisImage.loadDynamicImage(TexData, mTileWidth, mTileHeight, 1, PF_BYTE_RGBA, true);
00154                 mVisData = mVisImage.getData();
00155                 const String texname = filename + ".Visibility";
00156                 mVisTex = TextureManager::getSingleton().loadImage(texname, 
00157                                         opt->groupName,
00158                                         mVisImage, 
00159                                         TEX_TYPE_2D, 0, 1.0f);
00160                 TextureUnitState *tu1 = mVisibilityMaterial->getTechnique (0)->
00161                                         getPass (0)->createTextureUnitState(texname);
00162                 tu1->setTextureAddressingMode (TextureUnitState::TAM_CLAMP);
00163             }
00164             else
00165             {
00166                 const size_t s = mTileWidth * mTileHeight * 4;
00167                 uchar *TexData = new uchar [s];
00168                 memset (TexData, 0, s * sizeof(uchar));
00169                         // Assign the texture to the alpha map
00170                         mVisImage.loadDynamicImage(TexData, mTileWidth, mTileHeight, 1, PF_BYTE_RGBA, true);
00171                 mVisData = mVisImage.getData();
00172                 mVisTex = TextureManager::getSingleton().getByName (filename + ".Visibility");
00173             }
00174         }
00175         mVisibilityMaterial->load();
00176         material_enabled = true;
00177         return mVisibilityMaterial;
00178     }
00179     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00180     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::AddVisibleTile (const unsigned int Tilex, const unsigned int Tilez,
00181         const bool visible)
00182     {
00183         if (material_enabled)
00184         {
00185             const unsigned int tilePos = (Tilex + Tilez * mTileWidth) * 4;
00186             if (visible) 
00187             {
00188                 mVisData [ tilePos ]    = 0;
00189                 mVisData [ tilePos + 1] = 255;
00190                 mVisData [ tilePos + 2] = 0;
00191                 mVisData [ tilePos + 3] = 255;
00192             }
00193             else
00194             {
00195                 mVisData [ tilePos ]    = 255;
00196                 mVisData [ tilePos + 1] = 0;
00197                 mVisData [ tilePos + 2] = 0;
00198                 mVisData [ tilePos + 3] = 255;
00199             }
00200         }
00201     }
00202     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00203     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::AddVisibleTile (const PagingLandScapeTileInfo *info, 
00204         const bool visible)
00205     {
00206         if (material_enabled)
00207         {
00208                         const unsigned int TileX = info->mPageX*mNumTilesPage + info->mTileX;
00209             const unsigned int TileZ = info->mPageZ*mNumTilesPage + info->mTileZ;
00210 
00211             AddVisibleTile (TileX, TileZ, visible);      
00212         }
00213     }
00214     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00215     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::registerMinMaxHeightPage (const unsigned int pageX, const unsigned int pageZ,
00216                                                         const Real minHeight, const Real maxHeight)
00217     { 
00218        const size_t pos = mPageWidth*mPageHeight;
00219        mMinPageHeights[pos] = minHeight;
00220        mMaxPageHeights[pos] = maxHeight;       
00221     }
00222     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223     void PagingLandScapeHorizon::registerMinMaxHeightTile (const PagingLandScapeTileInfo *info,
00224                                                         const Real minHeight, const Real maxHeight)        
00225     {   
00226                 const size_t tilePos = (info->mPageX*mNumTilesPage + info->mTileX
00227            + ((info->mPageZ*mNumTilesPage)  + info->mTileZ) * mTileWidth); 
00228 
00229        assert (tilePos < mTileWidth*mTileHeight);
00230 
00231        mMinTileHeights[tilePos] = minHeight;
00232        mMaxTileHeights[tilePos] = maxHeight;
00233        
00234        const size_t pagePos = info->mPageX + info->mPageZ * mPageWidth; 
00235 
00236        assert (pagePos < mPageWidth*mPageHeight);
00237 
00238        // if tile height is maximum or minimum height page
00239         if (mMaxPageHeights[pagePos] < maxHeight)
00240             mMaxPageHeights[pagePos] = maxHeight;
00241         if (mMinPageHeights[pagePos] > minHeight)
00242             mMinPageHeights[pagePos] = minHeight;
00243     }
00244     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00245     bool PagingLandScapeHorizon::IsPageVisible(const PagingLandScapeCamera* cam,
00246                                                const unsigned int destpageX, const unsigned int destpageZ)
00247     {
00248         const Real PageX = cam->mCurrentCameraPageX;
00249         const Real PageZ = cam->mCurrentCameraPageZ;
00250 
00251         // test if there is potential occluders
00252         if (fabs (PageX - destpageX) < 2 && fabs (PageZ - destpageZ) < 2)
00253             return true;
00254 
00255        assert (destpageX + destpageZ*mPageWidth < mPageWidth*mPageHeight);
00256 
00257         return calcVis(Vector3 (PageX, cam->getDerivedPosition ().y, PageZ), 
00258                        Vector3 (destpageX, mMaxPageHeights[destpageX + destpageZ*mPageWidth], destpageZ), 
00259                        mMinPageHeights, mPageWidth, mPageHeight);
00260     }
00261     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00262     bool PagingLandScapeHorizon::IsTileVisible(const PagingLandScapeCamera* cam,
00263                                                const PagingLandScapeTileInfo *destinfo)
00264     {         
00265 
00266 
00267         const Real RsrcTileX = cam->mCurrentCameraPageX * mNumTilesPage + cam->mCurrentCameraTileX;
00268         const Real RsrcTileZ = cam->mCurrentCameraPageZ * mNumTilesPage + cam->mCurrentCameraTileZ;
00269 
00270                 const Real RdestTileX = destinfo->mPageX*mNumTilesPage + destinfo->mTileX;
00271                 const Real RdestTileZ = destinfo->mPageZ*mNumTilesPage + destinfo->mTileZ;
00272        
00273         // test if there is potential occluders
00274         if (fabs (RsrcTileX - RdestTileX) < 2.0f && fabs (RsrcTileZ - RdestTileZ) < 2.0f)
00275             return true;
00276 
00277         const size_t pos = static_cast <size_t> (RdestTileX + RdestTileZ*mTileWidth);
00278         
00279        assert (pos < mTileWidth*mTileHeight);
00280 
00281         return calcVis(Vector3 (RsrcTileX, cam->getDerivedPosition ().y, RsrcTileZ), 
00282                        Vector3 (RdestTileX, mMaxTileHeights[pos], RdestTileZ), 
00283                         mMinTileHeights, mTileWidth, mTileHeight);
00284     }
00285     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00286     bool PagingLandScapeHorizon::calcVis(const Vector3 &src, const Vector3 &dest, 
00287                                          const Real * const heightMap, 
00288                                          const unsigned int mapWidth, const unsigned int mapHeight)
00289     {
00290         /* Make sure the ray is normalised */
00291         const Real x = dest.x - src.x;
00292         const Real z = dest.z - src.z;
00293         /*normalise only on x and z*/
00294         const Real fLength = Math::Sqrt(x * x + z * z);
00295         // Will also work for zero-sized vectors, but will change nothing
00296         if (fLength < 1e-08)
00297             return true;
00298 
00299         const Real fInvLength = 1.0 / fLength;
00300         const Vector3 direction (x * fInvLength,
00301                                  (dest.y - src.y) * fInvLength,
00302                                  z * fInvLength);          
00303         
00304 
00305         Real lasty = src.y;
00306 
00307         Vector3 currpos = src + direction; // fetch new tile
00308 
00309         /* For each heightmap location in the ray */ 
00310         while (currpos.x >= 0 &&
00311                 currpos.z >= 0 &&
00312                 currpos.x < mapWidth &&
00313                 currpos.z < mapHeight)
00314         {
00315             const size_t posx = static_cast <size_t> (currpos.x + 0.5f);
00316             const size_t posz = static_cast <size_t> (currpos.z + 0.5f);
00317             if (posx == dest.x && posz == dest.z)
00318                 break;
00319 
00320             Real curry = currpos.y;
00321             currpos = currpos + direction;  // fetch new tile
00322             const Real nexty = currpos.y;   // fetch next tile height
00323             
00324             const Real h = heightMap[posx + posz*mapWidth];
00325             if (h > nexty && h > lasty)
00326             {
00327                 AddVisibleTile (static_cast <unsigned int> (dest.x),
00328                                 static_cast <unsigned int> (dest.z),
00329                                                     false);
00330                 return false; // line of sight is occluded               
00331             }
00332             lasty = curry;           
00333         }
00334         AddVisibleTile (static_cast <unsigned int> (dest.x),
00335                         static_cast <unsigned int> (dest.z),
00336                         true);
00337         return true;
00338     }
